>>>>> "Mike" == Mike Dierken <mdierken@...> writes:

    Mike> What are the differences between SMTP and message queueing
    Mike> (besides cost)?

I think the basics are:

1. Transactions (one or more messages within a transaction get there
   all or none).

2. Guaranteed delivery (+ error handling in case of timeouts).

3. Notification of delivery.

4. Guaranteed order of delivery.

5. Priorization.


-- 
Regards,

Berend. (-:
